ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, I d definitely do the msg board thing. If they re a good bunch of people, they ll make sure you re happy, and not ripped off.  :) Let us know what you
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, I'd definitely do the msg board thing.

If they're a good bunch of people, they'll make sure you're happy, and not
ripped off. :)

Let us know what you get!

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2001 12:03 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...


At 11:38 AM 7/2/2001 -0400, you wrote:
>Talies is trying to tread lightly, since he/she (sorry, I have no idea
>which..heh) wants to join the guild. :) Maybe it is worth that much, but
>he/she may come across as a greedy lewt...(you know)...if he/she starts
>asking for all that stuff.

He ;)
And you nailed it in one. As for "immediate entrance" - my entrance is
secured for all of my characters - on the condition that I make 30th
level. This was a mutual agreement between me and the person I'm making
the trade with, because he got me into the last guild I was in, so we're
friends, and I don't want to renege on that.

I also don't want to ask them to kill a dragon, because they have a
schedule for that, and all of the Bards in the Guild are on a schedule to
receive their epic stuff. So what I'm trying for is enough to be worth
this windfall, without appearing to take advantage of my soon-to-be
Guildmates.

I will let you know how it goes.

Thanks!

Talies


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
